refnamediv.refpurpose: Check if filesystem supports extended attributes

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This functions checks if filesystem holding file path supports extended attributes. Read access to file path is required.
This function returns &true; if filesystem supports extended attributes, &false; if it doesn't and &null; if it can't be determined (for example wrong path or lack of permissions to file).

example.title: xattr_supported example
example.para: The following code checks if we can use extended attributes.
example.programlisting:
<?php
$file = 'some_file';

if (xattr_supported($file)) {
    /* ... make use of some xattr_* functions ... */
}

?>

refsect1.para: See also xattr_get, xattr_set, xattr_remove, xattr_list.
